comment: Not very clear on lectures or tests. Easy class, as long as you keep up w/ the book. HE WILL CANCEL CLASS W/O ANY WARNING FREQUENTLY! Attendence isn't neccesary if you know the material. He knows his material, but his grammer isn't very good, so it can be difficult to understand what he is trying to say sometimes. Overall, he is a good teacher.

Woldeab has "gotcha" tests.  I've never done so poorly in a Sci class before.  His questions always have 2 strong possible answers.  He even admitted his tests are sometimes worded wrong.  Entire class of 200 argued with him.  Power point teacher only and they aren't even his slides.  If you question him he NEVER answers directly.  AVOID!
If i could only use the words i desire on here!!! DO NOT BE FOOLED BY THE PEOPLE THAT SAY HE IS GOOD. HES NOT! BIOLOGY IS MY FAV SUB. ALL A STUDENT. I GOT a C IN HIS CLASS. WHATS MORE TO SAY?

He is not a bad teacher but he expects you to attend class and those extra credit quizzes are given when too many students leave the classroom early or they just don't come.  You can not argue with him about his tests being confusing or tricky because you will loose.  OK to take him if there is not one out there with better ratings.

Not a very difficult teacher in my opinion. Attendance is not mandatory, but if you don't come you'll miss important info that may be on the test (and isn't in his notes). Tests are over his notes and anything else mentioned in class, such as videos we watch. He offers extra credit quizzes, which was nice (and another reason to come to class).

Horrible horrible horrible. Do not be fooled by any good ratings. He has no clue what he's doing and his lectures consist of reading powerpoints he didn't even make himself. Prof. Haile just doesn't know how to convey ideas properly or how to make it clear what you need to really know. I think he can become good, but if you want a good Biology prof

Very good professor. I've come to the conclusion that many people rating him low simply don't come to class. His tests mirror the lecture notes which he posts online. Extremely helpful and detailed. Gives great examples. As for the lab report, is it really that difficult to type out ~8 pages on labs as easy as these? Page count includes graphs...

Do not take him. He has no idea what he is doing. His tests are nothing like his lectures. Who knows where he gets them from. If you want to know what you made on a test (a scantron test) be prepared to wait! It's like he doesn't have time to do anything for his class. His lab class is a joke, but yet he expects you to do a good formal report?

I don't understand all the horrible ratings. He wasn't the best professor I've ever had but he was ok. Took Sci 1101 over the summer. Had 3 tests and no labs. Easy tests, 40 mult ch questions. He posts the powerpoints online, just study those and glance at the book. Let us out early almost every day. Nice guy, I recommend him.

AWFUL AWFUL AWFUL. Somehow I got a C and i worked harder in this class than any class I've ever been in. If you're in his class now, drop him. If you're looking to get in with him, DON'T. Is power points seem straightforward and easy but the test is nothing like them. He is a nice guy but he does nothing to work with you or make it better. AWFUL
This class was totally ridiculous. I failed. I went to class and studied the powerpoints. He is useless. He doesnt teach anything, he simply reads the powerpoints. Do not take this class.

I got a B overall in his class, but don't know how I achieved that grade. In fact, I don't know what grade I got on any of the three tests. I was given a number of correct answers out of 40, which has no bearing on the grade given because of his strange grading scale. I don't understand.....

This person is a scientist, not a teacher. He is absolutely unable to explain a confusing part in the material, creates his tests based on his knowledge and not what he is teaching! If you are good in science - take him. On your own you will be fine. If you are not - run like a bat out of hell. And whoever said he was cute must have been desparate!

I have know idea why anyone would give this guy a bad review. We had three exams. I would read over his ppoint and the highlighted words in the book the night before the test and made an A on all 3 exams.

Very boring class! Supposed to be an easy class but wasn't. Attendance isn't mandatory but he gives extra credit so if you aren't there you will miss it. He is always slow about posting grades and waited until the night before our final to post study guide. Tests are hard and have nothing to with study guides or notes.

This was my first B so far! I attended every class and studied. His grading scheme was very unclear, and when I would email him about it.. he would ignore it. He doesn't seem to care that much about the students concerns, which is really frustrating. He seemed like he would be helpful... but NOPE. I don't recommend him

Yes, he is a nice guy. However, In my two years at KSU I have never had a teacher this bad. Boring lectures, Poor Review, Ridiculous tests that have little to nothing to do with lectures or study guides. I showed up every day, took notes, read the book and the labs and still managed to do poorly on all 3 tests. AVOID

Lectures boring. He never really did much of what he said he would do, so don't depend on him. Our grades were so bad on the tests that he had to seriously curve them. Tests VERY confusing... 2-3 answers could arguably be right. It seemed as if he made the tests like right before we took them. I thought I would enjoy the class, but I was WRONG.

Not a very good teacher. Seems like a young guy with his Dr's degree. Got a upset when we kept asking too many questions and not understanding him, but he kept trying. I did terrible on his test because I never new what he was asking for but still got a B.

Very nice guy. Class extremely boring and he's a bit unclear with his questions on test(unwilling to change for the most part). He'll give extra credit though if most of the class is doing bad. If you question his information, he seems to get a little fustrated. Overall nice guy.
he is a nice guy, class is a little boring but attendance not required, notes online, only 3 tests. it is pretty easy i would recommend him
Really great guy. A little borign at times but very into the human aspect of science. Some extra credit and 4 tests right from the book, in depth reviews before test days help. Take him.
